command.name: add-ajax-form
command.title: Add an AJAX form to the module
command.help:
This command adds a new AJAX form to the given module. The AJAX form contains an <f:view> component and is intended to be retrieved and submitted by using some AJAX operation. The associated response is a JSON that allows to perform update operations.
web/<module>/forms/<form-name>-form.xhtml web/<module>/forms/<form-name>-response.xhtml
